![Unlock DAO Newsletter | February 2026](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/1572f8bc33b5f563df8e607f4ad1fdf6f2f5f055b15eddbdf37a4dce6adcc62d.jpg)

<h1 id="h-hey-locksmiths" class="text-4xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Hey Locksmiths!</h1><p>Welcome to the February edition of the 2026 Unlock DAO newsletter! It's been a wild month, but don't worry if you missed the action. This update covers the DAO's ongoing journey to navigate governance challenges, new tools for community engagement and contribution, and exciting partnerships taking shape. As always, the Unlock community continues to build, experiment, and push forward.</p><p>Let's dive in!</p><hr><h2 id="h-governance" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Governance</h2><p><strong>The Quest for Quorum</strong></p><p>If you've been following the DAO calls, you've heard the term "quorum" come up more than a few times. Here's the situation: Unlock's governance requires 3 million tokens as a minimum "quorum" to pass proposals, and recent changes to token delegation have made hitting that threshold more challenging. A large number of tokens have been inadvertently delegated to inactive wallets, and previously active voting wallets have reduced their participation. This is everyday business for DAOs!</p><p>A key clarification emerged during recent discussions: <strong>For</strong> and <strong>Abstain</strong> votes count toward quorum, while <strong>Against</strong> votes do not. This distinction matters as the DAO explores solutions.</p><p><strong>Two paths are currently being evaluated:</strong></p><ol><li><p><strong>Multi-delegation from treasury</strong> — <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/dannithomx/">Danny</a> is working with <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/juliengenestoux/">Julien</a> on a contract that would allow the treasury to delegate voting power to active stewards and/or community leaders. Stella quickly fixed up a <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://auburn-hide-65473633.figma.site/">leaderboard</a> based on the Tally API to verify voter participation:</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-newsletter---february-2026/ec37c958875ad415fd188816515ec37c583791768cee882eac08d5ed7718911b.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1190" nextwidth="2615" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li><li><p><strong>Treasury abstains from voting</strong>&nbsp;— The treasury could vote Abstain on proposals to help reach a quorum without influencing the outcome. This approach has been discussed as a way to preserve trust while addressing the participation problem, but it is short-term because it creates security concerns during execution and adds overhead from coordination time.</p></li></ol><p>If neither solution proves sufficient, a future proposal to lower the quorum threshold remains on the table, as do other potential solutions raised by active community members.</p><p>The <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tally.xyz/gov/unlock-protocol/proposal/21066157490052963548918160756361617828864411686883580579625267108106574436332">Q1/Q2 2026 Budget Proposal</a> was live on Tally and saw record voter turnout thanks to community mobilization efforts. Progress is being made, but a quorum couldn't be reached! Join the discussion on our Discord.</p><hr><h2 id="h-promotion-engagement-and-contributions" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Promotion, Engagement &amp; Contributions</h2><p><strong>Metopia</strong></p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-newsletter---february-2026/1ca2c29c42023886e7f462b81218cfa7aede21b287865b2dadd89acb116d9f3d.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="711" nextwidth="1280" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>Two platforms are now live to help community members engage with and contribute to Unlock:</p><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://metopia.xyz/">Metopia</a> launched as a learn-and-earn platform where users can complete quizzes about Unlock Protocol and earn UP token rewards. It's a straightforward way to onboard newcomers while rewarding existing community members for deepening their knowledge.</p><p><strong>Incented</strong></p><p>The <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1462800447286018242">Incented campaign</a> is moving forward for short-form video content creation, funded by leftover <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://carrotcastle.xyz/">Carrot Castle</a> resources. The structure:</p><ul><li><p><strong>USDC rewards</strong> for content creators</p></li><li><p><strong>UP token rewards</strong> for voters who curate quality submissions</p></li><li><p><strong>Hidden voting</strong> to prevent popularity contests</p></li><li><p><strong>Carrot/stick mechanism</strong> — correct votes are rewarded, incorrect votes face slashing</p></li></ul><p>A.I. virality scoring tools are being discussed to help creators gauge content quality before submission (with a 50% threshold as a benchmark). Office hours have been proposed to support participants through the process. Join the discussion on Discord and share your ideas &amp; feedback!</p><p>A potential synergy: Metopia course completion could eventually gate Incented submissions, ensuring contributors have baseline protocol knowledge and brand alignment. This is collaborate2win optionality that DAOs do best!</p><hr><h2 id="h-partnerships-and-collaborations" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Partnerships &amp; Collaborations</h2><ul><li><p><strong>CELO x GreenGoods</strong><br>A co-marketing campaign is in development with the GreenPill DevGuild team. Their app, GreenGoods, tracks regenerative actions and uses Unlock for certification. More details in the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jObjmb55jYMHoHgsSNE6wtm9HZ-j-SzpSjEViT29QT0/edit?usp=sharing">collaboration document</a>.</p></li><li><p><strong>Phoenix Gate App</strong><br>The <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://github.com/The-ALANA-Project/PhoenixGate">Phoenix Gate</a> NFC scanner app for iOS and Android is soon ready for community testing. <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/stellaachenbach/">Stella</a> &amp; Karel created the app together. This completes the mobile tooling needed for the Digital Spender's Club collaboration and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://burner.pro/">burner.pro</a> integration planned for 2026 events.</p></li><li><p><strong>Merch Store Proposal</strong><br>ALANA has proposed taking over management of Unlock merchandise through an immersive 3D boutique experience (currently ~65-70% complete). The community is invited to review and provide feedback in the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1293256220722987069">merch store forum thread</a>.</p></li></ul><hr><h2 id="h-community-spotlights" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Community Spotlights</h2><ul><li><p><strong>Danny — P2E Inferno &amp; Teerex</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1417535826149118075">P2E Inferno</a> recently integrated CELO and Good Dollar verification and is running gaming tournaments, including Call of Duty Mobile and chess competitions. <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.teerex.live/">Teerex</a>, his event ticketing platform built on Unlock, focuses on live event scheduling and is seeking additional community testers to try the platform and provide feedback.</p></li><li><p><strong>Disky.eth — FigClank Studio</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/927525019930738738/1465752825618366739">FigClank Studio</a> is a Web3 design tool (think Figma alternative) with Farcaster integration. Plans are underway for the Unlock integration, including temporary subscriptions and membership lending features. Alpha testers welcome.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-newsletter---february-2026/ff097da8a7a4804afe27b891bc762819aad8e810812ea30309158f4a760334d8.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1873" nextwidth="3783" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/william-torbet/"><strong>WillT</strong></a><strong> — TreeGens &amp; KF Media</strong><br>The TreeGens Ambassador Program has minted 247 keys across 244 unique holders, resulting in 100 Unlock certificates launching on Base. KF Media now has a dedicated marketing team and participated in the CreatorFi Accelerator.</p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/theDesignMojo"><strong>Thibault</strong></a><strong> — Octant Integration</strong><br>Research into Octant's staking and donation model identified opportunities to integrate membership to incentivize staker participation. A proposal has been pitched to the Octant team; response pending.</p></li></ul><hr><h2 id="h-current-action-items" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Current Action Items</h2><p>Here's how you can get involved and prepare for the discussions coming up:</p><ol><li><p>Vote on our onchain proposals via <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tally.xyz/gov/unlock-protocol">Tally</a> or <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://unlock.degov.ai/">degov</a></p></li><li><p>Review the following topics to add to the discussion:</p><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1470866517943128107">DAO Token Delegation discussion</a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1462800447286018242">Incented campaign design and participation</a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1293256220722987069">Merch store proposal</a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1468346238259695707">Trigs' Communications Steward proposal</a></p></li></ul></li><li><p>If you are an Unlock Community Member, don't hesitate to post in our <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/927525019930738738">spotlight channel</a> so we can shed some light on what you are building on and with the protocol!</p></li><li><p>Share our social media posts and engage with campaigns across <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol">X</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@unlock.dao?_t=ZT-8sqNLXE6lfn&amp;_r=1">Tik Tok</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/unlock-protocol-dao/">LinkedIn</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/@UnlockProtocol">YouTube</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://farcaster.xyz/unlock-protocol">Farcaster</a>—let's amplify our message together!</p></li></ol><hr><p>Thanks for following along, fellow locksmiths, and always remember:</p><h3 id="h-unlock-isnt-just-a-tool-for-access-its-a-protocol-for-belonging" class="text-2xl font-header !mt-6 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Unlock isn't just a tool for access— it's a protocol for belonging.</strong></h3><p>Stay classy out there, Trigs</p><hr><h2 id="h-join-us" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Join Us:</strong></h2><ul><li><p><a
